Info

Defines function get_response_stream. Retrieves a response stream, optionally decoding it if gzip-encoded.

testspeednet.net.utils.get_response_stream.get_response_stream(response: HTTPResponse | None) → GzipDecodedResponse | HTTPResponse | None[source]¶

Retrieves a response stream, optionally decoding it if gzip-encoded.

Parameters:

response (<Optional[HTTPResponse]>) – The HTTP response object

Returns:

Either a GzipDecodedResponse or the original HTTPResponse

Return type:

<Optional[GzipDecodedResponse | HTTPResponse]>

Exceptions:

None
